services.headline: Complete care from quick fixes to complex repairs
services.description: We combine experienced technicians, modern diagnostics and transparent communication. Choose from clear service packages or ask for a tailored plan.
services.helper: Pick the service you need to see all details.

items.title: Oil change
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Fast engine oil replacement, new filter and a basic fluid check according to the manufacturer guidance.

items.title: Brake discs and pads replacement
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Precise replacement of discs and pads including cleaning of contact surfaces and brake system bleeding.

items.title: Transmission oil change
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Complete exchange of transmission oil, leak inspection and shifting diagnostics for smooth operation.

items.title: Tyre service
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Tyre fitting and balancing, puncture repairs and seasonal tyre change with optional storage.

items.title: Wheel alignment
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Laser adjustment of toe and camber for stable handling and even tyre wear.

items.title: A/C service
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Air conditioning diagnostics, refrigerant refill and system disinfection for a healthy cabin climate.

items.title: Diagnostics
items.subtitle: When something fails
items.description: Advanced control unit diagnostics with live data reading and a clear repair plan.

items.title: Mechanical repairs
items.subtitle: When something fails
items.description: Repairs of suspension, engine and exhaust components using quality parts and guaranteed workmanship.

items.title: Engine overhauls
items.subtitle: When something fails
items.description: Complete engine rebuilds including measuring tolerances, machining parts and controlled break-in after assembly.

items.title: Bodywork
items.subtitle: Accident or vandal?
items.description: Chassis straightening, panel replacement and paint preparation at factory-level quality.

items.title: Windscreen replacement
items.subtitle: Accident or vandal?
items.description: Quick replacement of front, side and rear glass with calibration of cameras and assistance systems.

items.title: Panel painting
items.subtitle: Accident or vandal?
items.description: Professional painting of individual panels or whole bodies in a dust-free booth with accurate colour mixing.

items.title: Technical inspection (MOT)
items.subtitle: Checks and inspections
items.description: Preparation for technical inspection, arranging emissions tests and resolving any findings promptly.

items.title: Seasonal vehicle check
items.subtitle: Checks and inspections
items.description: Comprehensive checklist of fluids, brakes, suspension and electrics to keep the car ready for the season.

items.title: Pre-purchase inspection
items.subtitle: Checks and inspections
items.description: Detailed examination of a used vehicle on a lift, diagnostics and photo documentation for a confident purchase.

items.title: Suspension vibration test
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Vibration testing reveals play in dampers, bushings and bearings and provides a clear measurement report.

items.title: Fleet service
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Fleet maintenance with contracted pricing, cost reporting and pick-up or delivery options.

items.title: Convertible roof repair
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Specialised repairs of fabric and hardtop convertible roofs, mechanism adjustment and surface treatment.

items.title: Manual gearbox oil change
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Flushing and replacing oil in manual gearboxes, including checking synchronisers and cover seals.

items.title: A/C recharge
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Air conditioning refill with precise refrigerant dosing, system vacuuming and leak pressure testing.

hero.badge: Complete care for personal and fleet vehicles
hero.heading: EURO MOTORS – reliable care for your car in Prague
hero.description: Precise service, transparent communication and maximum focus on safety. We handle regular maintenance, complex repairs and MOT preparation.

address.label: Edisonova 8, Prague 10
address.description: Easy parking and EV charging on-site

about.heading: Committed to quality, fair pricing and personal service
about.description: EURO MOTORS is a family-run workshop built on open communication and long-term customer relationships. We handle every job individually and only recommend what truly benefits the condition of the vehicle.
about.quote: "Our goal is for every customer to leave feeling safe and confident."

quality.heading: Transparent repair process and premium customer care
quality.description: You are informed about every stage of the repair. We share photos, explain procedures and recommend sustainable solutions for a long vehicle lifespan.
quality.cardDescription: A simple process that respects your time.

steps.contact: Call us or fill in the contact form and we will schedule a visit.
steps.diagnostics: A technician runs diagnostics and we agree the scope of work together.
steps.handover: After the service we hand over the car clean and ready to drive.

faq.heading: Answers that help before you visit the workshop
faq.description: If you cannot find the answer, call or email us and we will be happy to help.

afterHours.question: Can I arrange a visit outside opening hours?
afterHours.answer: Give us a call and we will do our best to accommodate you even outside the standard schedule. We will agree a specific time together.

quoteEstimate.question: How do you calculate the repair price?
quoteEstimate.answer: We start with diagnostics and prepare a cost estimate covering parts and labour. You are informed about every change in advance and approve it.

replacementCar.question: Do you provide a replacement vehicle?
replacementCar.answer: For selected repair types we offer short-term replacement cars. We will check availability while booking.

ownParts.question: Can I bring my own spare parts?
ownParts.answer: We work with verified components so we can guarantee quality and warranty. For that reason we do not install customer-supplied parts.

contact.heading: We are ready to take care of your vehicle
contact.description: Book by phone or use the online form. We will help you choose the right service and prepare a non-binding quote.

unknown.label: Operating mode
unknown.detail: Opening hours will be confirmed soon.

hero.title: Get in touch
hero.intro: Need to reach us? Choose the channel that suits you best.

phones.title: Contact numbers
phones.description: Call us to book a service visit or discuss repairs.

bodyshop.title: Paint shop | Body shop | Detailing
bodyshop.description: Bodywork repairs, refinishing and detailing care.

details.title: Contact details
details.description: Address, email and social channels in one place.

hours.title: Opening hours
hours.description: By prior arrangement we will try to assist you outside standard hours as well.

weekdays.label: Monday - Friday
weekdays.note: Contact us in advance to arrange an individual time if needed.

weekend.label: Saturday & Sunday
weekend.note: Call us and we will look for an individual arrangement if urgent.

registration.label: Company registration
registration.value: File C 321387 kept at the Municipal Court in Prague

hero.title: About the EURO MOTORS workshop
hero.description: Get to know the values that shape our service philosophy. We live the idea of "Thinking together" in every repair we deliver.

introduction.title: Thinking together
introduction.subtitle: Every booking is a sign of trust that we want to honour.

paragraphs.mission: Allow us to introduce our workshop and the mindset that defines it. The EURO MOTORS motto "Thinking together" means we always look for the option that truly benefits you.
paragraphs.approach: We approach every job as a personal commitment. We listen, explain each step and recommend the solution that best matches your budget and the needs of your car.
paragraphs.team: Maximum quality, fair pricing and short turnaround times are goals shared by the whole team. From the mechanics to the warehouse and management, everyone focuses fully on your vehicle.

values.title: Values we put into practice
values.description: What you can rely on whenever you visit EURO MOTORS.

partnership.title: Partnership with every customer
partnership.description: Trust and openness guide the way we communicate. We share information transparently and only recommend what genuinely makes sense.

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship and accountability
craftsmanship.description: Qualified technicians, proven parts and a willingness to stand behind our work are the cornerstones of each service.

transparency.title: Transparent communication
transparency.description: You always know what will happen and how much it will cost. There are no hidden extras or last-minute surprises.

care.title: Comfort throughout the service
care.description: Additional services designed to save you time and hassle.

replacementCar.title: Replacement vehicle
replacementCar.description: Depending on the job we can provide a short-term loaner so you can stay mobile.

pickup.title: Pick-up & drop-off
pickup.description: We collect your car, carry out the repair and bring it back ready to drive.

detailing.title: Finishing touch detailing
detailing.description: Once the work is complete, we return the car clean so the handover feels special.

commitments.title: What we guarantee
commitments.description: Reliability matters, which is why we keep our promises.

communication.title: Ongoing communication
communication.description: We keep you informed via phone or email as the job progresses.

documentation.title: Documentation and approvals
documentation.description: We share photos and recommendations, and obtain approval before any change.

deadlines.title: Agreed timelines respected
deadlines.description: We plan efficiently so the vehicle is ready at the time we commit to.

cta.title: Would you like to know more?
cta.description: Get in touch and let’s discuss how we can help.

hero.title: Privacy policy
hero.description: We explain how we process personal data of customers, prospects and visitors in a transparent way.

introduction.title: I. Introductory provisions
introduction.body:
The data controller is euromotors corporation s.r.o., ID 08580405, registered office V Pitkovičkách 351, 104 00 Prague 10, entered in the Commercial Register maintained by the Municipal Court in Prague, Section C, Insert 321387. The company acts as controller when processing data of customers, prospects and website visitors.

Personal data means any information that can identify an individual directly or indirectly – such as name, contact details, transaction information or device identifiers.

These principles describe what data we process, for which purposes, on what legal grounds and for how long. Whenever we refer to GDPR or Czech legislation, we follow their current wording.

purposes.title: II. Purposes and retention
purposes.body:
We only process personal data to the extent necessary to deliver our services and fulfil statutory duties. For each purpose we define a proportional retention period and respect the principle of data minimisation.

Most processing is based on contract performance, legitimate interest or legal obligation. For marketing outside that scope we request your consent, which can be withdrawn at any time.
purposes.list:
- fulfilling service orders and logistics, including invoicing
- communicating with clients, handling enquiries and claims
- meeting accounting and tax obligations
- operating and securing the website, analytics and cookies
- informing about services and news when consent has been granted

protection.title: III. Data protection measures
protection.body:
We implement technical and organisational measures to prevent unauthorised access, loss or misuse of data. Only trained personnel bound by confidentiality have access, and we rely on encrypted channels, access management, backups and regular reviews.

Data is processed both manually and automatically; however, we do not make decisions based solely on automated processing that would produce legal effects.

sharing.title: IV. Disclosure to third parties
sharing.body:
We share data only with trusted processors who support us with customer care, logistics, IT operations, accounting or legal services. Each processor works under contract, is bound by confidentiality and may use the data solely for the agreed purpose.

When required by law we may also provide data to public authorities.

rights.title: V. Data subject rights
rights.body: Anyone whose data we process can exercise the rights laid down in the GDPR. Requests can be sent to euromotorsofficial@gmail.com or mailed to the company address; we respond within 30 days and may ask for identity verification before handling the request.
rights.list:
- request confirmation whether we process your data and gain access to it
- ask for rectification of inaccurate or incomplete data
- demand erasure if the purpose expired or consent was withdrawn
- restrict processing, object to it, or withdraw consent
- obtain a copy of data in a structured format and request its transfer to another controller
- lodge a complaint with the Czech Data Protection Authority

conclusion.title: VI. Final provisions
conclusion.body:
All relations are governed by the laws of the Czech Republic. Contact us through the listed channels with any questions; the competent supervisory authority is the Office for Personal Data Protection (www.uoou.cz).

We review these principles regularly and publish the current version on our website.

cta.title: Need more details?
cta.description: Get in touch and we will gladly clarify how we handle personal data or how to exercise your rights.

hero.title: Terms & Conditions
hero.description: A complete overview of the contractual rights and obligations when buying goods or using the services of euromotors corporation s.r.o.

introduction.title: I. Introductory Provisions
introduction.body:
These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern the contractual relationship between the Seller operating the online store at www.euromotors.cz and the Buyer – consumer or business customer – through the web interface.

The Seller is euromotors corporation s.r.o., Company ID 08580405, registered office at V Pitkovičkách 351, 104 00 Prague 10, entered in the Commercial Register maintained by the Municipal Court in Prague, Section C, Insert 321387.

A consumer is a natural person who concludes and fulfils the contract outside the scope of their business activity. A business customer is a person performing a gainful activity independently on their own account and responsibility.

The Terms set out the mutual rights and obligations arising from purchase agreements concluded online. Unless stipulated otherwise, the relationship is governed by the Czech Civil Code and the Act on Consumer Protection.

If the Terms conflict with an individually agreed contract, the contract prevails. By submitting an order, the Buyer confirms that they have read and accepted the Terms; the version effective at the time of ordering always applies. A copy of the Terms is attached to the order confirmation and the Seller may amend the Terms in the future.

contract.title: II. Purchase Agreement
contract.body:
The purchase agreement covers the distance sale of goods offered on the Seller's web interface. Product presentation is non-binding and the Seller is not obliged to conclude a contract. Prices include VAT and applicable fees, remaining valid while displayed on the website. The Seller may deliver goods in any colour variation. Ordering is completed via the online basket, including the selection of goods, payment method and delivery option.

The Buyer sends the order by clicking "Complete order" and the Seller confirms receipt by e-mail without undue delay. Depending on the order, the Seller may request additional confirmation. The contractual relationship arises once the order is submitted; title transfers only after the purchase price is fully paid. The Buyer may cancel the order before payment electronically or by phone.

The Buyer agrees to the use of distance communication means and bears the related costs.
contract.list:
- selected goods placed in the basket
- the chosen payment method and delivery option
- information on delivery costs

pricing.title: III. Price and Payment Terms
pricing.body:
The purchase price may be paid in cash upon personal collection or cash on delivery, by bank transfer, via payment gateway, or by online card payment. Unless stated otherwise, the price also includes packaging and delivery costs. For cash or cash-on-delivery payments the price is due on collection; for cashless payments it is due within 48 hours of submitting the order. Failure to pay within this period entitles the Seller to withdraw from the contract; goods are released only after full payment. The Seller confirms receipt of payment by e-mail.

The Buyer must state the variable symbol; discounts cannot be combined. The Seller issues a tax document and is obliged to record sales pursuant to the Czech Sales Records Act. Goods remain the property of the Seller until fully paid and collected.
pricing.list:
- cash on personal pickup
- cash on delivery
- bank transfer to the Seller's account
- payment via online gateway
- online card payment

delivery.title: IV. Delivery of Goods
delivery.body:
Goods are delivered to the address specified by the Buyer or can be collected in person at Edisonova 15/8, Prague 10 – Petrovice. The delivery option is selected during checkout; if a special request is made, the Buyer bears the risk and extra costs. The Buyer must cooperate, provide correct delivery details and accept the goods on delivery.

If re-delivery or alternative delivery is required due to the Buyer, they must cover the additional costs. Upon receipt the Buyer must check the packaging and report any defects to the carrier immediately; damaged consignments may be refused. Liability for accidental destruction passes upon acceptance. The standard delivery time is up to 14 days, usually within 10 business days after payment.
delivery.list:
- delivery to the Buyer's address
- personal pickup at Edisonova 15/8, Prague 10
- individual transport based on agreement

withdrawal.title: V. Withdrawal from the Agreement
withdrawal.body:
A consumer Buyer may withdraw from the contract within 14 days of receiving the goods or the final part of the delivery. Withdrawal can be sent electronically or by post and will be confirmed by the Seller. The deadline is met if the notification is sent in time. A template withdrawal form is available on the Seller's website.

Goods must be returned within 14 days of withdrawing, undamaged, unused and preferably in the original packaging; return shipping costs are borne by the Buyer. The Seller refunds payments within 14 days using the original payment method but may wait until goods are returned or dispatch is proven. If the value decreases due to improper handling, the Seller may claim compensation. The Seller may withdraw from the contract before the goods are accepted and refunds payments without delay.

Withdrawal is excluded in cases listed in Section 1837 of the Czech Civil Code (e.g. customised goods or perishable items).
withdrawal.list:
- provide identification details and product specification
- cover the costs of returning the goods
- return items in their original condition
- expect reimbursement once the goods are returned
- take responsibility for any loss of value caused by improper handling

defects.title: VI. Rights Arising from Defective Performance
defects.body: The Seller warrants that goods are defect-free upon receipt and possess the properties agreed or customary. Liability covers quantity, quality, workmanship and compliance with legal requirements. If a defect appears within six months, it is presumed to have existed upon receipt. Rights from defective performance arise both from defects present at the transfer of risk and defects caused by the Seller's breach of duty.
defects.listTitle: Depending on the defect, the Buyer may request:
defects.list:
- delivery of new goods free from defects or missing parts
- a free repair
- a reasonable price reduction
- withdrawal from the contract in case of a material breach
- a refund if repair or replacement is impossible
- reimbursement of reasonable costs incurred when making a claim

privacy.title: VII. Personal Data Protection
privacy.body: All information provided by the Buyer is treated as confidential and processed solely to perform the contract unless the Buyer grants consent for other use. Details are set out in the Privacy Policy published on the Seller's website, fulfilling the GDPR information obligation. Supervision is exercised by the Czech Office for Personal Data Protection and, regarding consumer protection, by the Czech Trade Inspection Authority.

communication.title: VIII. Communication
communication.body: Notices may be delivered to the Buyer via the e-mail address provided to the Seller.

disputes.title: IX. Alternative Dispute Resolution
disputes.body: The Buyer is entitled to out-of-court resolution of consumer disputes arising from the purchase agreement. The competent authority is the Czech Trade Inspection Authority, Štěpánská 567/15, 120 00 Prague 2, Company ID 00020869, www.coi.cz. The EU online dispute resolution platform at ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr may also be used. The European Consumer Centre Czech Republic acts as the contact point.

supervision.title: X. Supervisory Authority
supervision.body: The Seller's activities are supervised by the Czech Trade Inspection Authority, Štěpánská 567/15, 120 00 Prague 2, phone +420 222 703 404, e-mail podatelna@coi.cz, www.coi.cz. The Seller is the responsible contact person towards the authority.

conclusion.title: XI. Final Provisions
conclusion.body:
These Terms have been valid since 4 October 2021. Relations between the Seller and Buyer are governed by Czech law; if an international element is involved, Czech law is chosen without prejudice to consumer protection under Article 6 of the Rome I Regulation. All rights to the Seller's website, including content and logo, belong to the Seller and may not be copied without consent.

If any provision becomes invalid or ineffective, it is replaced by a provision closest in meaning; the validity of the remaining provisions remains unaffected. The purchase agreement, including the Terms, is archived electronically and is not publicly accessible. The Seller may amend the Terms while keeping rights and obligations arising under earlier versions unaffected.

cta.title: Need clarity on the Terms?
cta.description: Get in touch – we will explain any section of the Terms or assist with your specific case.

hero.title: Returns & Complaints Policy
hero.description: How to raise a warranty claim, statutory deadlines and responsibilities in line with Czech law.

introduction.title: I. Introductory provisions
introduction.body: euromotors corporation s.r.o. (ID 08580405) uses this complaints policy to inform consumers about the scope, conditions and process of asserting rights arising from defective performance. Business customers are governed exclusively by the Czech Civil Code; this policy does not apply to them. The document is based on the Civil Code, the Consumer Protection Act and other Czech legislation and forms an integral part of the general terms and conditions. By concluding a purchase contract, the customer confirms that they have read this policy and will follow it together with all applicable law.

liability.title: II. Liability for product defects
liability.body: The seller guarantees that the goods are free from defects at the time of takeover and that they meet the expected characteristics, purpose, quality, quantity and statutory requirements. A tax document and, where applicable, a warranty certificate are supplied with the goods; the warranty period starts on collection or delivery to the agreed address. Claims cannot be made for shortcomings the customer was informed about in advance, nor for wear and tear. The seller may provide an extended quality guarantee described in the relevant warranty statement. Claim deadlines are suspended while a claim is being processed and the seller will provide details on request.
liability.listTitle: Claims do not cover defects caused by:
liability.list:
- mechanical damage or unauthorised interference
- force majeure, electrical surges or other external influences
- use contrary to the instructions, common practice or manufacturer requirements
- operation in unsuitable conditions (temperature, dust, humidity, chemical or mechanical exposure)
- improper installation, handling or maintenance
- tampered or removed warranty seals, where applicable
- clearly incorrect use or neglected care
- intentional damage or normal wear and tear

filing.title: III. Filing a claim
filing.body: On delivery the customer must check the quantity, packaging and completeness of the goods and notify the seller of any discrepancies without undue delay. Unless stated otherwise, defects can be reported within 24 months of takeover.
filing.listTitle: When submitting a claim, the customer must:
filing.list:
- present proof of purchase or otherwise demonstrate that the goods were bought from the seller
- hand over the product being claimed unless agreed otherwise
- comply with the conditions stated in the warranty certificate
- provide the original warranty certificate when claiming under an extended warranty
- include all accessories when requesting a replacement or contract withdrawal
- cooperate in verifying the defect, completing the claim report and confirm it with their signature

resolution.title: IV. Claim handling
resolution.body: Claims can be submitted in person at Edisonova 15/8, 109 00 Prague-Petrovice or by shipping the goods to that address. The seller will decide on the claim immediately, or within three working days for complex cases; the time needed for expert assessment is excluded from this period. A written claim report describing the defect and requested resolution is issued upon receipt. Claims must be resolved without undue delay and no later than 30 days unless a longer period is agreed. The seller may refuse products that are excessively dirty or delivered in breach of hygiene regulations. Customers are informed of the outcome via the agreed channel and receive written confirmation of the resolution.

rights.title: V. Rights arising from defects
rights.body: If the defect is remediable and the claim is filed in time, the customer is entitled to free repair. Instead of repair they may request replacement of the goods or accessories, or withdraw from the contract if the defect recurs or multiple defects appear simultaneously. In the event of a material breach of contract the customer may demand an appropriate discount or withdraw from the contract. No rights arise if the customer knew about the defect before takeover or caused it themselves.
rights.listTitle: Depending on the situation, the customer may request:
rights.list:
- free repair of the defect
- replacement of the product or missing component
- an appropriate discount on the purchase price
- withdrawal from the purchase contract in case of a material breach
- reimbursement of reasonable expenses related to the claim

settlement.title: VI. Compensation and dispute resolution
settlement.body: Where a claim is accepted, the customer may claim reimbursement of reasonable costs incurred while exercising their rights. If a claim is rejected, the customer may obtain an independent expert opinion. Should a dispute remain unresolved, the customer can contact the Czech Trade Inspection Authority (Štěpánská 567/15, 120 00 Prague 2, www.coi.cz), the competent body for out-of-court consumer dispute resolution, or use the EU online dispute resolution platform.

effectiveness.title: VII. Effectiveness of this policy
effectiveness.body: This complaints policy has been valid and effective since 4 October 2021. The seller reserves the right to amend it; updated versions take effect on the day following publication without affecting rights and obligations that arose under previous versions.
